text: Pier Paolo Capponi (9 June 1938 â€“ 15 February 2018) was an Italian actor and screenwriter. He was sometimes credited as Norman Clark. He was known for his roles in The Cat o' Nine Tails, Valerie Inside Outside, and in A Season of Giants. Capponi died on 15 February 2018 in Torri in Sabina at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian screenwriters
